title: Trade Commodities
description: There are five different categories of Commodities: Food, Lumber, Luxuries, Ore, and Stone. When you Trade Commodities, select one Commodity that your kingdom currently stockpiles and reduce that Commodity’s stockpile by up to 4. Then attempt a basic check. If you trade with a group that you’ve established diplomatic relations with, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to the check.

modifiers.name: Trading with a group with established diplomatic relationships
modifiers.buttonLabel: +1 Circumstance to trade with a group with established diplomatic relationships

criticalSuccess.msg: @gainMultiple2ResourceDiceNextTurn per point of stockpile expended from your Commodity now.

success.msg: @gainMultiple1ResourceDiceNextTurn per point of stockpile expended from your Commodity now.

criticalFailure.msg: You gain no bonus Resource Dice (though the Commodity remains depleted). If you Traded Commodities the previous turn, @gain1Unrest
